page.title: 12FARMING
page.content: In our twelve square killometre block there are eleven farms.These keep either pigs or cattle.Some just grow crops.There are also some nurseries selling plants to the public.Two of these farmers were interveiwed by us and here are the results. In Raby there is a farm owned by Mr Ford.The Ford family have had the farm for 63 years.There are 19.2 acres of land.The milk goes to the co_op.Mr Ford keeps 130 cows,13 sheep and 5 horses,2 bulls one a british fresian and the other a Hereford. Glenmoriston farm have got 45 pigs,34 cows,and 7 horses.The farm is owned by the Sterling family,it is a family buisness.They made the farm house themselves. In Raby there are some nurseries called Raby nurseries.They have many plants which they sell to the public.
